statements: SELECT * FROM venues ORDER BY venue_name ASC;
SELECT venue_name, capacity, rental_cost FROM venues WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT venue_name, amenities FROM venues WHERE ARRAY_LENGTH(amenities) > 0 ORDER BY venue_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM venues WHERE rental_cost < 500.00;
SELECT venue_name, capacity, rental_cost FROM venues WHERE capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY rental_cost DESC;

SELECT * FROM venues WHERE capacity > 50 AND rental_cost BETWEEN 300 AND 600 ORDER BY venue_id
